contentText.text: After Jian refused the cash a second time, the supplier insisted that he at least accept a USD$100 restaurant gift card. Eduardo told Jian that his best friend owns the restaurant, and he often gets gift cards for free. Jian noted that the value was more modest and that paying for meals is more customary in business and so he accepted.

A few weeks later, Jian takes his wife to dinner using the gift card. While at the bar waiting for their table, Jian sees Eduardo dining at a nearby table, and they wave hello. While Jian and his wife are reading the menu, the restaurant sommelier approaches the table, holding a bottle of wine.

revelCollOut.text: Thank you for dining with us tonight. Please accept this bottle of wine, which is from someone in our restaurant who wants to send his best wishes – the wine is for special guests and not listed on the menu.
